comment: I took this as an online class. You really don't need the professor but the times I did she never responded to emails and she never graded anything until weeks later. Other than that the class wasn't bad at all. Do all the assignments by the due date and you'll get an A.

This professor was ok. She wasnt great at responding to emails, or giving feedback if you had questions. There are 6 modules that you must complete. You have about 2-3 weeks to complete each module. At the end of each module there is a quiz. My biggest advice to you is to have the chapter lessons open while taking the quizzes.
Great class to take online. She's really great about getting back to you through email and will accept late assignments. Solid choice if you're looking to take this class online.

I took this class online and it was an easy 100. There are 3 or 4 assignments due each month that take maybe 10 minutes to complete tops. Very simple. Idk how she is in class, but online her class was a breeze. She was super understanding about late assignments too.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Never ever take her. She don't know what she is teaching. She is not at all helpful.
Ms johnson is a nice person but not a good teacher. she does not teach. all she does is click the mouse for the next lecture slide. she always seems so mad about everything. easy class...bad teacher

This class is a waste of time. It's pretty much everything you already know about health. No exercise= fat, etc. The tests are ridiculously complex,and it should be an easy "A" and for most people it is. Her teaching style was horrible, she acted like she didnt want to be there at all.
